main.name: UKAOBASI CALLISTUS
main.bio: A highly experienced Software engineer , Leader,  with over 4 years of developing and managing web projects from inception to delivery. An acute understanding of the development process and methodologies to improve productivity and efficiencies within a cross-functional environment. Proven track record of launching successful web projects with a 'Customer First' mindset.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Studied the design, development, and analysis of software and hardware used to solve problems in a wide range of business, scientific, and social contexts.
Highly experienced in designing, developing, and managing Java-based desktop applications.

work.title: Frontend Web developer(Inter)
work.description: i assisted the web development team with all aspects of website and application development. i was responsible for  collecting and documenting  user requirements and i also  assisted  in troubleshooting and debugging software applications.

work.title: Fullstack Web Developer (Remote)
work.description: I Employed the mastery of front-end languages and libraries  in collaboration with in-house web designers  to create user oriented visuals and features. Applied version control software (git) to track ,and optimize pre-existing source code. Analyzed and resolved technical and application problems. Adhered to high quality development principles while delivering.Assisted in building secured REST apis.
